resources.string: Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy outlines how Collaborative development Company collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use the Secure mobile application. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information remains secure. Information Collection and Use We do not collect any personal information when you use the mobile application. You may choose to provide us with your personal information by filling out a contact form or sending us an email. In such cases, we will use your personal information only to respond to your inquiries and to provide you with the information you have requested. Responsibility for Handling Your Data: We do not hold any personal data about you. You are fully responsible for handling your own data, including any personal information you choose to provide to us. Data Security Although we do not collect or hold any personal data about you, we take data security very seriously. We have implemented measures to protect our website and mobile application from unauthorized access, disclosure, or modification. Changes to this Privacy Policy We reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy regularly to stay informed about our information practices. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy or our use of your personal information, please reach us via email unbiveristy_of_wolvehampton@wlv.ac.uk
